titleStmt.title: A coole conference between the Scottish commissioners cleared reformation, and the Holland ministers apologeticall narration, brought together by a well-willer to both.

notesStmt.note: A reply to Thos. Goodwin's An apologeticall narration, 1643.
Imprint fron McAlpin catalogue. Wing suggests 1686 as imprint date.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
